# archestra_sso_provider (Resource)

Manages an SSO provider configured for the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `provider_id` (String) Provider identifier (e.g., 'google', 'azure')

### Optional

- `domain` (String)
- `issuer` (String)
- `oidc_config` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--oidc_config))

### Read-Only

- `domain_verified` (Boolean)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--oidc_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `oidc_config`

Optional:

- `authorization_endpoint` (String)
- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive)
- `discovery_endpoint` (String)
- `pkce` (Boolean)
- `scopes` (List of String)
- `token_endpoint_authentication` (String)
- `user_info_endpoint` (String)
